name: The Jay-Game
description:
A game made by myself during the LudumDare43 on Unity.

It's a scoring game where score is represented by gold.

During your turn you can move your character right or left and attack 1 monster. To end your turn, click the down arrow.

When you attack a monster, it will create death cards around it according to the indication on the monster's card. If a death card comes down on your character you die.

Every monster that pass the down line makes you loose life, depending on their power. A gold or healing card can be collected only if it comes down on your character.

Enjoy !
